name: A Ghostly Survival
description:
Survive hordes of ghosts in an ever changing arena. Every 10 seconds the arena will change and you must adapt your playstyle in order to survive. 

This was created for Ludum Dare 51. This was created in my own custom Game Engine. This is also my very first game I have released using this engine (and in general) so I'm sorry for any bugs or issues! Feel free to post any bugs/issues or comments below, send the Butter.log file if possible! This game is free to download but if you want to help support my game development journey by donating than I would really appreciate it!

NOTE:  This may not run on everyone's systems, it uses OpenGL graphics and is built for Windows 10!

To Run:
Extract .zip to computer

Run GhostlySurvival.exe

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse Move - Aim

Left Mouse -  Shoot

R - Reset Game

Known Issues:
May crash unexpectedly  (still trying to figure it out)

Player can get popped out of level if more than 1 enemy pushes on them.
